name: Premium Grade 'A' Coffee Beans Powder | Blended Arabica Coffee | Black Coffee (Pack of 2)
description:
• SUPERIOR QUALITY BEANS: This blend of hand-picked, ground, premium 'Grade A' coffee beans with its characteristic texture and aroma is a true and long-lasting delight
  • PROMOTES WELLNESS: Contains the right amount of caffeine that helps reducing inflammation as well as helps in reducing headaches.
  • ORIGIN: Originates at an altitude of 3850 to 5350 feet, amidst the rich biodiversity and tranquil environs of the Baba Budan hills of Chikmagalur, revered by coffee
  • PACKAGE CONTENT: 2 packs of Baarbara Premium Blended Coffee Powder; Quantity: 2*250 gms
  • SHELF LIFE: 12 months from the date of packaging
